text:
last week, i got accepted to @_buildspace (s5) - an incubator for ideas, backed by ycombinator and a16z🔥 

been working @_nightsweekends since my birthday (june 15) to decide on the idea i’ll BUIDL during the 6-week program. and after dozens of feedback from other people, and multiple iterations, I present to you ~ EDEN ✨

🙏 i would love to hear your thoughts on this passion project of mine. 

will build it for the next 6 weeks. your feedback would be much appreciated! I might even give you “good credits” later on for the feedback! xoxo

user_info.name: Chii 👑
user_info.description: ★ building eden, a social experiment on a community where good deeds are the currency ★ bitcoin '13, ai ‘14, xr ‘16, crypto trading '17, nfts & metaverse '20 ★
